SEARCH
Package blackjack

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
blackjack.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
The Deck class represents a standard deck of 52 playing cards used in a game of Blackjack.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Constructs a standard 52-card deck.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructs a standard 52-card deck.

      This constructor initializes the standard Blackjack deck.

  • Method Details

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck of cards.

      The Collections.shuffle(java.util.List) method is used to randomize the order of the cards in the deck.

    • getCards

      protected LinkedList<Card> getCards()
      Return all cards from deck.
      Returns:
      cards from deck.

    • dealCard

      public Card dealCard()
      Deals the top card from the deck.

      This method removes and returns the first card from the deck.

      Returns:
      new card Card from deck.
